summary: The diff does not add the required static logo and favicon image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, nor does it show any update to `frontend/index.html` for the favicon. Only meta/documentation-like files (`frontend-file-summaries.txt`, `project_state.json`) were modified, and they describe additional UI/theme/copy changes that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the site’s brand logo static asset with the user-uploaded KR Staffing logo artwork at `/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x128.png` (file at `frontend/public/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x128.png`).
missing_requirements.reason: No new image asset file was added in the diff (Added: 0), and there is no evidence that `frontend/public/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x128.png` was created/updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and set a matching favicon derived from the uploaded logo artwork at `/assets/generated/brand-favicon.dim_64x64.png` (file at `frontend/public/assets/generated/brand-favicon.dim_64x64.png`), with `frontend/index.html` continuing to reference it.
missing_requirements.reason: No favicon image file was added in the diff (Added: 0), and `frontend/index.html` is not shown as modified or referenced in the modified files list.

hallucinated_features.description: Site-wide UI/UX alignment and red theme changes, plus broad content/copy and component changes (Header/Footer/etc.) beyond swapping static logo/favicon assets.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly about replacing two static assets (logo and favicon) while keeping existing paths and avoiding other UI/functionality changes; the diff’s summaries describe extensive unrelated changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions changes across many files, e.g., `frontend/src/index.css` red theme updates; `frontend/src/content/copy.ts` updated copy; `frontend/src/components/layout/Header.tsx`/`Footer.tsx` changes)
project_state.json summary describing broad UI/UX alignment and trust/compliance copy additions
